definition: round/lump/ball/to roll into a ball/to gather/regiment/group/society/classifier for a lump or a soft mass: wad (of paper), ball (of wool), cloud (of smoke)
people's organization (eg. labor unions, peasant associations, scholarly associations etc)/mass organization

sentences.english: With him went the noble levy and the private magnate armies.
sentences.chinese: 徵募的貴族民團和權貴的私軍與他同行。

sentences.english: The vigilante group had vowed yesterday to extend the operation all over Central Kenya
sentences.chinese: 民團昨天曾誓言要把他們的行動擴大到肯尼亞中部。

sentences.english: Compassionate and disinterested groups of people.
sentences.chinese: 有同情心而且無私的人民團體。

sentences.english: Such model of education deserves close study in the history of education.
sentences.chinese: 新民團的識字教學模式及其成績在教育史上值得研究。

sentences.english: Lin was explicitly, yellow rate with baylor scattered on armed.
sentences.chinese: 林被罷官，黃率民團與貝勒展開惡鬥。

sentences.english: The noble levy, deciding their duty was discharged, dispersed.
sentences.chinese: 貴族民團被解除他們義務，解散。

sentences.english: Army-people unity as a people, and proved the world who can.
sentences.chinese: 軍民團結如一人，試看天下誰能敵。
